Changelog
=========
0.3 (2011-04-05)
-------------------
- CSS typography in folder view
- Document view
- CSS for document view

0.2 (2011-04-05)
-------------------
- Folder view
- CSS
- ZCML bugfix
- Search box bug fix

0.1 (2011-04-05)
-------------------

- Initial release
- Base CSS and Structure
- Dependency on plonetheme.intkBase
